tika-abh05t1:5_0: Dhātukathāpakaraṇadesanāya desadesakaparisāpadesā vuttappakārā evāti kālāpadesaṁ dassento ‘‘dhātukathāpakaraṇaṁ desento’’tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t1:5_1: ‘‘Tasseva anantaraṁ adesayī’’ti hi iminā vibhaṅgānantaraṁ dhātukathā desitāti tassā desanākālo apadiṭṭho hoti.
tika-abh05t1:6_0: ‘‘Kāmā te paṭhamā senā’’tiādivacanato (su. ni. 438; mahāni. 28; cūḷani.
tika-abh05t1:6_1: nandamāṇavapucchāniddesa 47) kilesaviddhaṁsanampi devaputtamārassa balavidhamananti sakkā vattuṁ,
tika-abh05t1:6_6: Nanu cetaṁ pañcannaṁ mārānaṁ bhañjanaṁ sāvakesupi labbhatevāti codanaṁ manasi katvā āha ‘‘parūpanissayarahita’’ntiādi.
tika-abh05t1:6_7: Vīrassa bhāvo vīriyanti katvā vuttaṁ ‘‘mahāvīriyoti mahāvīro’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:6_8: Mahāvīriyatā ca paripuṇṇavīriyapāramitāya caturaṅgasamannāgatavīriyādhiṭṭhānena anaññasādhāraṇacatubbidhasammappadhānasampattiyā ca veditabbā.
tika-abh05t1:7_0: Khandhādike dhamme adhiṭṭhāya nissāya visayaṁ katvā abhidhammakathā pavattāti āha ‘‘abhidhammakathādhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vā’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:7_2: Etena atthavisesasannissayo byañjanasamudāyo pakaraṇanti vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-abh05t1:7_6: Yadi evaṁ sattannampi pakaraṇānaṁ dhātukathābhāvo āpajjatīti codanaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘yadipī’’tiādi.
tika-abh05t1:7_7: Tattha sātisayanti savisesaṁ vicittātirekavasena anavasesato ca desanāya pavattattā.
tika-abh05t1:7_8: Tathā hi vuttaṁ ‘‘sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā’’ti (dhātu. 5).
tika-abh05t1:8_1: tesaṁ vasena aññehipi asādhāraṇaṁ imassa pakaraṇassa dhātukathābhāvaṁ dassento ‘‘khandhāyatanadhātūhi vā’’tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t1:8_3: Mahanto pabhedānugato visayo etāsanti mahāvisayā, dhātuyo,
tika-abh05t1:8_5: Yena vā sabhāvena dhammā saṅgahāsaṅgahasampayogavippayogehi uddesaniddese labhanti,
tika-abh05t1:8_7: Sā dhātu idha sātisayaṁ desitāti savisesaṁ dhātuyā kathanato idaṁ pakaraṇaṁ ‘‘dhātukathā’’ti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:8_14: Kuto pakaraṇa-saddo labbhatīti āha ‘‘sattannaṁ pakaraṇānaṁ kamena vaṇṇanāya pavattattā’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:8_15: Tena yojanaṁ katvāti tena pakaraṇa-saddena ‘‘dhātukathāva pakaraṇaṁ dhātukathāpakaraṇa’’nti yojanaṁ katvā.
tika-abh05t1:8_18: ‘‘Atthaṁ dīpayissāmī’’ti vatvā ‘‘taṁ suṇāthā’’ti vadanto sotadvārānusārena tattha upadhāraṇe niyojetīti
tika-abh05t1:12_4: ‘‘Saṅgahitena sampayuttaṁ vippayutta’’ntiādīni pana tīṇi tīṇi padāni ekekaṁ padaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:12_8: taṁ pana pavattanaṁ ñāpanañca hotīti ‘‘pavattīyati ñāyantī’’ti ca dvidhāpi attho vutto.
tika-abh05t1:12_10: Atthadvayepi pavattanañāṇakiriyānaṁ karaṇabhāvena saṅgahādippakārā nayāti vuttā.
tika-abh05t1:14_1: Paṭicca samuppajjati saṅkhārādikaṁ etasmāti hi paṭiccasamuppādo,
tika-abh05t1:14_9: sokādayo ca sarūpatoyeva idha pāḷiyaṁ gahitāti codanaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘tatthā’’tiādi.
tika-abh05t1:14_10: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṁ ‘‘pañcavīsādhikena padasatenā’’ti evaṁ vutte aṭṭhakathāvacane.
tika-abh05t1:14_13: Padatthato pana kammabhavo bhavati etasmāti bhavo,
tika-abh05t1:15_0: ‘‘Sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā’’ti idampi dhātukathāya mātikākittanamevāti ‘‘sabbāpi…pe…
tika-abh05t1:15_1: mātikāti ayaṁ dhātukathāmātikāto bahiddhā vuttā’’ti vacanaṁ asambhāvento ‘‘atha vā’’tiādimāha .
tika-abh05t1:15_4: pakaraṇantaragatattā pana aññato gahetabbarūpā ito bahibhūtā nāma honti,
tika-abh05t1:15_9: Na hi mātikāya asaṅgahito koci padattho atthi.
tika-abh05t1:15_10: Vikiṇṇabhāvenāti khandhavibhaṅgādīsu visuṁ visuṁ kiṇṇabhāvena visaṭabhāvena.
tika-abh05t1:17_2: Yathāvuttadhammā yathārahaṁ khandhāyatanadhātuyo arūpino ca khandhāti tesaṁ uddeso nayamukhamātikā.
tika-abh05t1:17_7: saṅgahāsaṅgahadhammā ca viyogīsahayogīdhammā ca saṅgahā…pe… dhammā,
tika-abh05t1:17_14: yaṁ yaṁ padaṁ saṅgahito asaṅgahitoti ca vattuṁ yuttaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:18_3: Na saṅgahabhūtehīti saṅgahaṇakiriyāya karaṇabhūtehi saccādīhi saṅgahāsaṅgaho na vutto.
tika-abh05t1:18_4: Tatthāpi hi khandhāyatanadhātuyo eva karaṇabhūtāti dasseti.
tika-abh05t1:18_11: aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā’’ti saṅgahāsaṅgaho niyametvā vutto.
tika-abh05t1:19_0: Kasmā panettha saccādayo saṅgahavasena na vuttāti?
tika-abh05t1:19_3: saññādīnaṁ vā indriyādīhi saṅgahanayena pucchituṁ vissajjituṁ vāti.
tika-abh05t1:19_4: Tathā ariyaphalādīsu uppannavedanādīnaṁ saccavinimuttatāya ‘‘vedanākkhandho katihi saccehi saṅgahito’’ti
tika-abh05t1:19_5: pucchitvāpi ‘‘ekena saccena saṅgahito’’tiādinā niyametvā saṅgahaṁ dassetuṁ na sakkāti.
tika-abh05t1:20_0: Rūpaṁ rūpena nibbānena vā vippayuttaṁ na hoti,
tika-abh05t1:20_3: Catunnañhi khandhānaṁ aññamaññaṁ sampayogībhāvato ‘‘rūpanibbānehipi so atthi natthī’’ti siyā āsaṅkā,
tika-abh05t1:20_8: nibbānassa vā rūpena katthaci sampayogo atthīti tadāsaṅkābhāvato vippayogopi rūpassa rūpanibbānehi,
tika-abh05t1:20_12: Anārammaṇaanārammaṇamissakehīti anārammaṇena sotāyatanādinā anārammaṇamissakena ca dhammāyatanādinā.
tika-abh05t1:20_17: Yathā hi sārammaṇassa anārammaṇena anārammaṇamissakena ca vippayogo hoti,
tika-abh05t1:20_19: Tena viya anārammaṇassa anārammaṇamissakassa cāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:22_0: 4.Visuṁ yojanā kātabbāti yo tīhi saṅgaho catūhi ca sampayogo vutto,
tika-abh05t1:22_2: yo ca tīhi asaṅgaho catūhi ca vippayogo vutto,
tika-abh05t1:22_10: Idāni yathāvuttaṁ sabhāgataṁ sarūpato niddhāretvā dassetuṁ ‘‘tatthā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:22_12: ekuppādādiko sampayogeti iminā ruppanādividhuro asamānasabhāvo asaṅgahe visabhāgatā,
tika-abh05t1:22_13: nānuppādādiko vippayogeti ayamattho atthasiddhoti na vuttoti.
tika-abh05t1:24_0: 5.Etena ṭhapanākārenāti sarūpena aggahetvā yathāvuttena pakaraṇantaramātikāya idha mātikābhāvakittanasaṅkhātena ṭhapanākārena.
tika-abh05t1:24_1: Pakaraṇantaraṭhapitāya mātikāya avibhāgena pacchato gahaṇaṁ bahi ṭhapananti āha ‘‘bahi piṭṭhito ṭhapitattā’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:24_2: Idha aṭṭhapetvāti imissā dhātukathāya sarūpena avatvā.
tika-abh05t1:24_8: tesaṁ nayānaṁ pavattidvāralakkhaṇesu ca uddiṭṭhesu dhātukathāya uddesavasena vattabbaṁ vuttameva hotīti yaṁ uddesavasena vattabbaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:24_9: taṁ vatvā puna yathāvuttānaṁ khandhādīnaṁ kusalādivibhāgadassanatthaṁ ‘‘sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya
tika-abh05t1:24_10: mātikā’’ti vuttanti evamettha mātikāya nikkhepavidhi veditabbo.
tika-abh05t1:25_0: ‘‘Gāvīti ayamāhā’’ti ettha gāvī-saddo viya ‘‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’’ti ettha padatthavipallāsakārinā iti-saddena
tika-abh05t1:25_1: atthapadatthako saṅgahāsaṅgaha-saddo saddapadatthako jāyatīti adhippāyenāha ‘‘aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva
tika-abh05t1:25_5: Sāmaññena gahetabbatanti saṅgahasaddābhidheyyatāsāmaññena viññāyamāno vuccamāno vā.
tika-abh05t1:25_6: Na cettha sāmaññañca ekarūpamevāti codanā kātabbā bhedāpekkhattā tassa.
tika-abh05t1:25_9: ‘‘Attano jātiyā’’ti viññāyati yathā ‘‘matteyyā’’ti vutte attano mātu hitāti.
tika-abh05t1:26_0: Dhammavisesaṁ aniddhāretvāti saṅgahitatādinā pucchitabbavissajjetabbadhammānaṁ visesanaṁ akatvā.
tika-abh05t1:26_3: Avasesā niddhāretvāti ‘‘saṅgahitena asaṅgahita’’ntiādikā avasesā dvādasapi pucchitabbavissajjetabbadhammavisesaṁ
tika-abh05t1:26_5: Nanu ca ‘‘saṅgahitena asaṅgahita’’ntiādayopi yathāvuttavisesaṁ aniddhāretvā sāmaññena dhammānaṁ pucchanavissajjananayuddesāti
tika-abh05t1:26_13: tena sotāyatanādibhāvena asaṅgahito sotapasādādiko yo ruppanasabhāvo dhammaviseso.
tika-abh05t1:26_16: catūhi khandhehi asaṅgahitā’’tiādinā asaṅgahitatāsaṅkhāto pucchāvissajjananayo parato pucchitvā vissajjiyamāno idha uddiṭṭho hoti.
tika-abh05t1:26_17: Visesane karaṇavacananti iminā tassa dhammassa yathāvuttasaṅgahitatāvisesavisiṭṭhataṁyeva vibhāveti.
tika-abh05t1:26_18: Evamete pucchitabbavissajjetabbadhammavisesaṁ niddhāretvā pucchanavissajjananayuddesā pavattāti veditabbā.
tika-abh05t1:27_0: Nanu ca ‘‘saṅgahitena asaṅgahita’’nti ettāvatāpi ayamattho labbhatīti?
tika-abh05t1:27_4: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṁ saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese ‘‘cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t1:27_6: dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā’’ti vatvā ‘‘te dhammā katihi khandhehi…pe…
tika-abh05t1:27_8: 171) pucchitvā ‘‘te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā’’ti dutiyaṁ asaṅgahitapadaṁ gahitaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:28_0: Esa nayoti atidesena dassitamatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ kātuṁ ‘‘tesupī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:28_2: Kattuatthe karaṇaniddeso saṅgahitāsaṅgahitehi tehi dhammehi dhammānaṁ saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatāya vuttattā.
tika-abh05t1:28_3: Tathā hi tattha pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘tehi dhammehi ye dhammā’’ti dhammamukheneva saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatā vuttā.
tika-abh05t1:28_12: Dhammantarassāti tato aññassa dhammassa visesanaṁ kataṁ.
tika-abh05t1:28_13: Tattha hi antarena pakāravisesāmasanaṁ dhammeneva dhammo visesitoti.
tika-abh05t1:28_17: Dutiyatatiyesu viya visesane eva karaṇavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:29_1: saṅgahāsaṅgahānaṁ visuṁ saha ca visesanavisesitabbabhāvakappanatoti attho.
tika-abh05t1:29_2: Taṁ pana vikappanaṁ vuttākārena vibhajanaṁ hotīti āha ‘‘vibhāgatoti attho’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:29_3: Sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇena adhimokkhena sampayuttadhammā ārammaṇe nicchayanākārena pavattiyā sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttadhammā.
tika-abh05t1:29_4: Te ca tehi saddhiṁ tadavasiṭṭhe dvipañcaviññāṇavicikicchāsahagatadhamme ca saṅgahetvā āha ‘‘sanniṭṭhānavasena
tika-abh05t1:29_5: vuttā ca sabbe ca cittuppādā sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttasabbacittuppādā’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:29_14: adhimokkhapaccayā bhavo’’ti paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge ca āgataṁ vacanaṁ sandhāya.
tika-abh05t1:29_19: Tādisassāti phassādisadisassa sādhāraṇassa adhimokkhasadisassa asādhāraṇassa aññassa dhammassa abhāvā.
tika-abh05t1:30_2: atthi pana visesoti dassento āha ‘‘jīvitindriyaṁ panā’’tiādi.
tika-abh05t1:30_3: Asamādhisabhāvā balabhāvaṁ appattā sāmaññasaddeneva vattabbāti yojanā.
tika-abh05t1:30_4: Sāmaññavisesasaddehi cāti sāmaññavisesasaddehi vattabbā ca samādhisabhāvā cittekaggatā.
tika-abh05t1:30_5: Visesasaddavacanīyaṁ aññanti balappattasamādhito aññaṁ sāmaññasaddena byāpetabbaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:30_6: visesasaddena ca nivattetabbaṁ natthi samādhisabhāvāya eva cittekaggatāya gahitattā.
tika-abh05t1:30_12: Tato viparītehi aññaṁ byāpetabbaṁ nivattetabbañca gahetvā pavattehi sāmaññavisesasaddeheva na sukhādisabhāvā vedanā viya vattabbā.
tika-abh05t1:30_13: Tasmāti yasmā asamādhisabhāvā samādhisabhāvāti dvedhā bhinditvā gahitā cittekaggatā, tasmā.
tika-abh05t1:30_19: Nanu ca abhinditvā gayhamānā cittekaggatā vedanā viya sādhāraṇā hotīti codanaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘abhinnāpi vā’’tiādi.
tika-abh05t1:30_23: Na arahatīti idha uddesaṁ na arahati samukheneva vattabbesu phassādīsu uddisiyamānesūti attho.
tika-abh05t1:35_6: Evañca katvāti nayamukhamātikāya abhiññeyyanissayena vuccamānattā eva.
tika-abh05t1:35_7: Tesaṁ rūpadhammānaṁ pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ khandhabhāvena viya rūpakkhandhabhāvena sabhāgatā hoti,
tika-abh05t1:35_13: Saddadvārena pana gahaṇe rūpakkhandhavacanasaṅkhātena vā rūpakkhandhavacanavacanīyatāsaṅkhātena.
tika-abh05t1:35_14: Idāni tamevatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ kātuṁ ‘‘rūpakkhandhoti hī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:36_2: Abhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanaṁ khandhapadaniddese sabbapacchimamevāti āha ‘‘bhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanānantara’’nti.
tika-abh05t1:38_0: 40.Yadipiekakepi sadisaṁ vissajjanaṁ vissajjanaṁ samudayamaggasaccānaṁ ‘‘samudayasaccaṁ ekena khandhena…pe…
tika-abh05t1:38_1: maggasaccaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:38_2: catūhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahita’’nti (dhātu.
tika-abh05t1:38_6: Cakkhusotasukhindriyānañhi ‘‘ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:38_7: catūhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahita’’nti ekake sadisaṁ vissajjanaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:38_8: Cakkhusotindriyadukassa pana ‘‘cakkhundriyañca sotindriyañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t1:38_9: catūhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā’’ti,
tika-abh05t1:38_10: ‘‘cakkhundriyañca sukhindriyañca dvīhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t1:38_11: tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā’’ti cakkhusukhindriyadukassa ca asadisaṁ vissajjanaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:38_12: Nāpi dukehi tikassāti cakkhusotacakkhusukhindriyādidukehi cakkhusotasukhindriyāditikassa nāpi sadisaṁ vissajjanaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:38_16: na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā’’ti sadisaṁ vissajjanaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:41_9: Ekekabhūtānīti yathā ekasmiṁ rūpakalāpe jātiādīni ekekāniyeva honti,
tika-abh05t1:41_12: Anubhavanasañjānanavijānanakiccānaṁ vedanādīnaṁ nibbattiādibhūtānipi jātiādīni tathā na gayhantīti āha ‘‘vediyana…pe…
tika-abh05t1:41_16: aniccā saṅkhatā’’tiādivacanato jātiādīnampi saṅkhatapariyāyo atthīti saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccena saṅkhārakkhandhena
tika-abh05t1:41_20: Tathā duvidhānīti vuttappakārena rūpārūpadhammānaṁ nibbattiādibhāvena dvippakārāni.
tika-abh05t1:44_0: 171.‘‘Saṅgahitena asaṅgahita’’nti ettha saṅgahitāsaṅgahitasaddā bhinnādhikaraṇā na gahetabbā visesanavisesitabbatāya icchitattā.
tika-abh05t1:44_1: Yo hi dhammo saṅgahitatāvisesavisiṭṭho asaṅgahito heṭṭhā uddiṭṭho,
tika-abh05t1:44_2: sveva idha asaṅgahitabhāvena pucchitvā vissajjīyatīti dassento ‘‘yaṁ taṁ…pe…
tika-abh05t1:44_4: Ye hi dhammā cakkhāyatanena khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t1:44_6: tesaṁyeva puna khandhādīhi asaṅgaho pucchitvā vissajjito.
tika-abh05t1:44_12: Savisesāva khandhādigaṇanāti ‘‘khandhasaṅgahenā’’tiādinā avisesena vuttāpi rūpakkhandhādinā savisesāva khandhādigaṇanā,
tika-abh05t1:45_5: Ettakeneva dassetabbā siyuṁ tāvatāpi saṅgahitena asaṅgahitabhāvassa pakāsitattā.
tika-abh05t1:45_11: te khandhādayo kusalādayo ca tesaṁ visayabhūtāti tehi vinā saṅgahādīnaṁ pavatti natthi.
tika-abh05t1:45_14: Yo hi idha saṅgāhakabhāvena vutto dhammo asaṅgāhakabhāvenapi vuttoyevāti.
tika-abh05t1:46_4: tattha paṭhamanaye chaṭṭhanaye ca ‘‘rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi saṅgahito?
tika-abh05t1:46_10: Tassa tassāti yaṁ pucchitabbaṁ vissajjitabbañca ‘‘ye dhammā’’ti aniyamitarūpena niddhāritaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:47_6: taṁ tadeva ‘‘cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t1:47_8: Añño dhammo natthi tassa sabhāgabhāvena saṅgāhakasseva abhāvato.
tika-abh05t1:47_10: taṁ paṭikkhipanto āha ‘‘na ca so…pe… hotī’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:48_0: Yadicātiādināpi tasseva tena saṅgahābhāvaṁ pāṭhābhāvadassanena vibhāveti.
tika-abh05t1:48_1: Tattha so evāti yo rūpādikkhandho saṅgāhakabhāvena vutto,
tika-abh05t1:48_2: so eva tena rūpādikkhandhena saṅgayheyya saṅgahetabbo bhaveyya,
tika-abh05t1:48_3: teneva tassa saṅgahābhāve lakkhaṇaṁ dassento āha ‘‘na hi so eva tassa sabhāgo visabhāgo cā’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:48_5: Rūpakkhandho cakkhāyatanādīnaṁ na saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca sabhāgavisabhāgabhāvābhāvato.
tika-abh05t1:49_0: Yathā sabbena sabbaṁ sabhāgavisabhāgābhāvena ekadesānaṁ samudāyo saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca na hoti,
tika-abh05t1:49_2: Tattha yathātiādi udāharaṇadassanena yathāvuttassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:49_6: visabhāgaṁ yena samudāyo saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t1:49_7: Ettha ca saṅgāhakattaṁ tāva mā hotu,
tika-abh05t1:49_8: asaṅgāhakattaṁ pana kasmā paṭikkhipīyatīti codanaṁ manasi katvā āha ‘‘tasmā’’tiādi.
tika-abh05t1:49_13: Taṁ panetaṁ ‘‘rūpakkhandho rūpakkhandhena saṅgahito asaṅgahito ca na hotī’’tiādinā vutte tayo pakāre sandhāya vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:49_16: attekadesasabhāgo cāti vuttānaṁ saṅgāhakabhāvo eva natthi sabhāgābhāvato.
tika-abh05t1:49_17: Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘na hi so eva tassa sabhāgo’’tiādi.
tika-abh05t1:49_19: Evarūpānanti yathāvuttānaṁ tippakārānaṁ aggahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ satipi visabhāgabhāveti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t1:50_1: Ekadesassa vedanākkhandhādikassa samudāyassa dhammāyatanassa saṅgāhakattaṁ ekadesena samudāyassa saṅgahitabhāvanti attho,
tika-abh05t1:50_2: samudāyassa rūpakkhandhassa ekadesassa cakkhāyatanassa sotāyatanassa ca saṅgāhakattaṁ samudāyena ekadesassa saṅgahitabhāvanti vuttaṁ hoti.
tika-abh05t1:50_6: Pañcadhāti rūpādicatukkhandhasaṅgaho viññāṇakkhandhasaṅgahoti evaṁ pañcappakārena bhinnataṁ.
tika-abh05t1:50_15: tāni pana visesanabhūtāni appadhānānīti visesitabbabhūtānaṁ padhānānaṁ vasenevaṁ vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:50_16: ‘‘Cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā’’tiādinā kattuādayo niddiṭṭhāti āha ‘‘kattukaraṇakammattayasabbhāvā’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:51_5: Saṅgāhakasaṅgahetabbānanti cakkhāyatanādikassa saṅgāhakassa sotāyatanādikassa ca saṅgahetabbassa.
tika-abh05t1:51_9: Ayanti yvāyaṁ paṭhamanaye tathā tathā gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbatāsaṅkhāto dutiyādinayesu yathāvuttānaṁ samānakkhandhādibhāvābhāvasaṅkhāto
tika-abh05t1:52_2: Na hi sakkā ‘‘samudayasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t1:52_5: Itarehīti āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgāhakattāsaṅgāhakattābhāvato na uddhaṭānīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t1:52_7: Na rūpakkhandhoti na sabbo rūpakkhandhadhammoti attho.
tika-abh05t1:53_3: Karaṇaṁ pana katturahitaṁ natthīti āha ‘‘kenaci saṅgāhakenāti idaṁ pana ānetvā vattabba’’nti.
tika-abh05t1:53_4: Saṅgāhakesu na yujjati na saṅgahetabbesūti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t1:53_5: Rūpakkhandhadhammā hi ‘‘ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā’’ti vuttāti.
tika-abh05t1:53_6: Samudāye vuttavidhi tadavayavepi sambhavatīti codanaṁ samuṭṭhāpento ‘‘etena nayenā’’tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t1:53_7: Paṭiyogīnivattanaṁ eva-saddena karīyatīti āha ‘‘na hi aññamattanivāraṇaṁ eva-saddassa attho’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:53_8: Tenāha ‘‘saṅgāhakato aññanivāraṇaṁ eva-saddassa attho’’ti. So ca…pe…
tika-abh05t1:53_10: Saṅgāhakāpekkhatte hi ‘‘so cā’’tiādivacanassa ‘‘cakkhāyatanena rūpakkhandhova saṅgahito’’ti ettha cakkhāyatanaṁ
tika-abh05t1:53_11: saṅgāhakanti yathādhippetassa atthassa asambhavo evāti idāni taṁ asambhavaṁ vibhāvento ‘‘katha’’ntiādimāha,
tika-abh05t1:54_3: samudāyo vā tadekadesānaṁ saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca hotīti vuttovāyamatthoti āha ‘‘rūpakkhandho…pe…
tika-abh05t1:54_5: Iminā pariyāyenāti yasmā vuttappakāraṁ saṅgāhakattaṁ natthi ‘‘yena saṅgahitassa asaṅgāhakaṁ siyā’’ti iminā pariyāyena.
tika-abh05t1:54_9: Saṅgahitatāyāti nippariyāyena saṅgahitabhāvena asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vuttoti na yujjatīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t1:54_17: Etāni aññāni cāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-abh05t1:55_4: Samudayasaccādīsūti samudayasaccasukhindriyādīsu yujjeyya taṁ kāraṇaṁ. Kasmā?
tika-abh05t1:55_5: Tehi samudayasaccādīhi khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahite dhammajāte sati tassa āyatanasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgahitattassa abhāvato.
tika-abh05t1:55_8: ‘‘So eva tassa saṅgāhako na hotī’’ti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh05t1:55_11: Aññassa pana vedanākkhandhādikassa rūpakkhandhādinā saṅgahitattābhāvena asaṅgahitattaṁ atthīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t1:55_20: Tesanti khandhacatukkakhandhadukādīnaṁ asaṅgahitatā na natthi atthevāti tassā abhāvo anekantiko.
tika-abh05t1:56_1: Nivattetvā gaṇhantoti pubbe vuttaṁ paṭinivattetvā gaṇhanto paccāmasanto.
tika-abh05t1:56_4: na saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti yasmā nesaṁ asaṅgāhakattaṁ viya saṅgāhakattampi natthi,
tika-abh05t1:59_1: Tasmāti yasmā ekadesasabhāgatā samudāyasabhāgatā na hoti, tasmā.
tika-abh05t1:59_5: evaṁ ekadesasabhāgatāya asaṅgahitatāpi natthīti dassento ‘‘na kevala’’ntiādimāha.
tika-abh05t1:59_9: Na kathañci sammissāti kenacipi pakārena na sammissāti asammissatāya saṅgahitattābhāvaṁ sādheti.
tika-abh05t1:59_11: na hotīti yathā rūpakkhandhena sabhāgatābhāvato nibbānaṁ na kenacipi saṅgahaṇena saṅgahitaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:59_12: evaṁ viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi taṁ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṁ na hotīti khandhasaṅgahābhāvo pākaṭo vuttovāti evaṁ vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:60_1: Na hi nibbānaṁ sandhāya ‘‘rūpakkhandhena viññāṇakkhandhena cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t1:60_4: Tathā ‘‘abyākatehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t1:60_5: āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā’’tiādi na sakkā vattuṁ tādisassa dhammassa abhāvatoti āha ‘‘sanibbāna…pe…
tika-abh05t1:60_15: Asaṅgahitasaṅgāhakattāti khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitānaṁ saññākkhandhādīnaṁ āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgāhakattāti attho.
tika-abh05t1:61_0: Visabhāgakkhandhanibbānasamudāyattā khandhasaṅgahena dhammāyatanena na koci dhammo saṅgahito atthīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t1:61_1: Etassāti ‘‘dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā’’ti etassa padassa dhammāyatanagaṇanena saṅgahitāti attho.
tika-abh05t1:64_2: asaṅgahaṇapubbaṁ saṅgahaṇañca vuccamānaṁ saṅgahaṇāsaṅgahaṇānaṁ pavattivisesena vuttaṁ hotīti āha ‘‘saṅgahaṇā…pe…
tika-abh05t1:64_4: Saṅgahābhāvakato asaṅgaho saṅgahahetuko saṅgahassa pavattivisesoyeva nāma hotīti āha ‘‘saṅgahaṇappavattivisesavirahe’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:64_5: Kenaci samudayasaccādinā tīhipi saṅgahehi saṅgahitena saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannena dhammavisesena puna
tika-abh05t1:64_6: tatheva saṅgahito so eva samudayasaccādiko dhammaviseso saṅgahitena saṅgahito.
tika-abh05t1:64_9: Yathā hi tīhi saṅgahehi na saṅgāhakā,
tika-abh05t1:64_11: ekenapi saṅgahena na saṅgāhakā idha na uddhaṭā.
tika-abh05t1:64_12: Tehi saṅgahitāti tehi tīhi saṅgahehi saṅgahitā dhammā.
tika-abh05t1:65_1: Tena khandhādipadenāti ‘‘teneva saṅgahaṁ gaccheyyā’’ti ettha tena khandhādipadenāti evaṁ yojetabbaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:65_2: Evaṁ pana ayojetvā ‘‘yaṁ attano saṅgāhakaṁ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṁ gaccheyya,
tika-abh05t1:65_3: taṁ aññaṁ saṅgahitaṁ nāma natthī’’ti evaṁ na sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh05t1:65_5: Na hi yena samudayasaccādinā yaṁ saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṁ dhammajātaṁ khandhādisaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:65_7: na ca tasseva kevalassa samudayasaccādikassa saṅgaho pucchito vissajjitoti yojanā,
tika-abh05t1:65_10: Tasmā attano saṅgāhakaṁ sakalakkhaṇādiṁ saṅgaṇhitvā puna tena khandhādipadena yaṁ saṅgahaṁ gaccheyya,
tika-abh05t1:65_12: Vedanā saddo ca khandho āyatanañcāti vedanā visuṁ khandho,
tika-abh05t1:65_15: Asammissanti abyākatadukkhasaccādi viya amissitaṁ. Na hi…pe…
tika-abh05t1:65_16: etthāti saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhena dhammena yo dhammo saṅgahito,
tika-abh05t1:65_18: so na ettha vāre pucchito vissajjito ca.
tika-abh05t1:65_21: Na saṅgāhakenāti idaṁ yathāvuttena atthena nivattitassa dassanaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:68_1: tasmā yo ettha kenaci asaṅgahitena dhammavisesena puna asaṅgahito dhammaviseso asaṅgahitena asaṅgahito asaṅgahitatāya pucchitabbo vissajjitabbo ca.
tika-abh05t1:68_2: Tameva tāva yathāniddhāritaṁ dassento ‘‘rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā khandha…pe…
tika-abh05t1:68_17: tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahetabbassa atthitāya paripuṇṇasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakattāti attho.
tika-abh05t1:69_1: tasmā taṁ anidassanaappaṭighehi asaṅgahetabbaṁ na hotīti attho.
tika-abh05t1:69_5: nāmarūpapañhādayo pana catuvīsatīti āha ‘‘sabbepi catuttiṁsa hontī’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:69_8: ‘‘Rūpakkhandhenā’’tiādi sabbampi vā viññāpetuṁ icchitabhāvena vacanaṁ pañhabhāvato pucchā.
tika-abh05t1:69_11: Te hi lakkhaṇato dassitāti te niddhāritadhammā teneva asaṅgahitāsaṅgahitatāya niddhāraṇasaṅkhātena lakkhaṇena dassitā.
tika-abh05t1:70_2: taṁ khandhādīhi asaṅgahita’’nti ettha ‘‘khandhādīhevā’’ti avadhāraṇaṁ nippayojanaṁ pakārantarassa abhāvato.
tika-abh05t1:70_5: Tadevāti pana icchitaṁ uddhaṭasseva asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāvassa avadhāretabbattāti dassento ‘‘na kadācī’’tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t1:70_8: Niyamatoti sakkā vacanaseso yojetunti idampi eva-kārena siddhamevatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ kātuṁ vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:70_16: Etena yo pucchāya uddhaṭo tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahito,
tika-abh05t1:71_0: Avasesā vedanādayo tayo khandhā nibbānañca sakalena rūpakkhandhena tesaṁ saṅgaho natthīti ‘‘saṅgahitā’’ti na sakkā vattuṁ,
tika-abh05t1:71_1: ekadesena pana saṅgaho atthīti ‘‘asaṅgahitā na hontīti evaṁ daṭṭhabba’’nti āha.
tika-abh05t1:71_4: Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘anuddhaṭā vedanādayopi hi asaṅgahitā evā’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:71_8: Rūpaviññāṇehīti asukhumarūpadhammehi viññāṇena cāti ayamettha adhippāyoti dassento ‘‘oḷārika…pe…
tika-abh05t1:71_10: Kathaṁ pana rūpadhammāti vutte oḷārikarūpasseva gahaṇanti āha ‘‘rūpekadeso hi ettha rūpaggahaṇena gahito’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:72_1: asaṅgahitā’’ti evaṁ asaṅgāhakabhāvena vuttaṁ pucchitabbavissajjetabbabhāvena vuttampi kāmaṁ vedanādīheva catūhi asaṅgahitaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:72_2: taṁ pana na cakkhāyatanamevāti dassetuṁ ‘‘cakkhāyatanena panā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:72_4: Sabbaṁ dhammajātaṁ teva rūpādike dhamme udāneti pāḷiyaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:72_7: Dveti ‘‘bāhirā upādā dve’’ti ettha vuttaṁ dve-saddaṁ sandhāyāha.
tika-abh05t1:72_11: ‘‘Rūpaṁ dhammāyatana’’ntiādīnaṁ padānaṁ vasena dvevīsapadiko esa nayo.
tika-abh05t1:75_4: veditabba’’nti vatvā puna ‘‘rūpakkhandhādīsu hī’’tiādinā tamatthaṁ vivarati.
tika-abh05t1:75_5: Tattha na labbhatīti ‘‘sampayuttaṁ vippayutta’’nti vā gahetuṁ na labbhati,
tika-abh05t1:75_11: Tena panettha rūpadhammesu sampayogaṭṭho na labbhatīti ayamattho dassito hoti.
tika-abh05t1:75_18: tasmā ekuppādādibhāvarahitānaṁ rūpanibbānānaṁ sā ekuppādāditā visabhāgatā vuttā.
tika-abh05t1:75_23: Tattha tesaṁ tehīti ca arūpakkhandhe eva parāmasati.
tika-abh05t1:75_24: Visabhāgatā ca hoti rūpanibbānesu avijjamānattāti attho.
tika-abh05t1:76_0: Tīhi viññāṇadhātūhīti ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātūhi vippayutte anārammaṇamissake rūpadhammamissake dhamme dīpeti rūpabhavoti yojanā.
tika-abh05t1:76_4: Tathā hi ‘‘vippayutte ahonte sattahipi sampayutte sattapi vā tā’’ti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:77_0: Yadi evanti yadi anārammaṇamissānaṁ dhammānaṁ vippayogo natthi.
tika-abh05t1:77_4: Arūpakkhandheyeva pana sandhāya ‘‘tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā’’ti vuttanti nāyaṁ dosoti dasseti.
tika-abh05t1:77_6: Tadekadesaññasamudāyāti tasseva yathāvuttassa samudāyassa ekadesā hutvā aññesaṁ avayavānaṁ rūpakkhandhādīnaṁ samudāyabhūtā.
tika-abh05t1:77_9: Na hi samudāyāvayavānaṁ sāmaññavisesānaṁ viya accantabhedo atthi bhedābhedayuttattā.
tika-abh05t1:77_10: Tesaṁ accantabhedameva hi sandhāya ‘‘samudāyantogadhānaṁ ekadesānaṁ na vibhāgo atthī’’ti saṅgahepi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:77_15: Tasmāti yasmā vibhattasabhāvānaṁ na tesaṁ samudāyekadesādibhāvo, tasmā.
tika-abh05t1:77_16: Yasmā pana kusalādayo eva khandhādayoti khandhādiāmasanena samudāyekadesādibhāvo āpanno evāti vuttanayena vippayogābhāvo hoti,
tika-abh05t1:77_19: Aññamaññavippayuttatā vuttā ‘‘kusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā’’tiādinā.
tika-abh05t1:78_0: Chattiṁsāya piṭṭhidukapadesu vīsati dukapadāni imasmiṁ naye labbhanti,
tika-abh05t1:78_2: Tato eva ‘‘tevīsapadasata’’nti ettha ‘‘tevīsa’’nti idañca ‘‘ekavīsa’’nti vattabbanti yojanā.
tika-abh05t1:78_4: Ekakālekasantānānaṁ bhinnakālabhinnasantānānañca anekesaṁ dhammānaṁ samudāyabhūtā saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātuyoti āha ‘‘kālasantāna…pe…
tika-abh05t1:78_6: Ekadesasammissāti cittiddhipādādinā attano ekadeseneva khandhantarādīhi sammissā iddhipādādayo,
tika-abh05t1:78_10: saṅkhārakkhandhādīnaṁ ekadesavisesabhūtehi satipaṭṭhānasammappadhānasaññākkhandhādīhi vibhattā eva samudayasaccādayo sampayogīvippayogībhāvena,
tika-abh05t1:78_15: Na hi saṅkhārakkhandhādipariyāpannattepi samudayasaccādayo maggasaccādīhi sampayogaṁ labhanti.
tika-abh05t1:78_18: visabhāgatā cāti ekuppādāditāsaṅkhātā yathārahaṁ sabhāgatā visabhāgatā ca.
tika-abh05t1:78_19: Tena yathāvuttakāraṇena sampayogassa vippayogassa ca labhanato.
tika-abh05t1:79_1: Vattamānā ca ekasmiṁ santāne ekekadhammā vattanti.
tika-abh05t1:79_6: Yadi samānakālassa vibhajitabbassa abhāvato cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo viññāṇakkhandhassa vibhāgaṁ na karonti,
tika-abh05t1:79_8: manoviññāṇadhātu soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā’’ti vuttanti codanaṁ manasi katvā āha ‘‘khandhāyatana…pe…
tika-abh05t1:79_10: Evamevanti yathā dhātuvibhāgena vibhattassa viññāṇassa, evamevaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:80_1: Yathā hi samānakālasantānehi ekacittuppādagatehi vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhehi samudayasaccassa sampayuttatā,
tika-abh05t1:80_2: evaṁ bhinnasantānehi bhinnakālehi ca tehi tassa vippayuttatāti āha ‘‘evaṁ taṁvippayogībhāvaṁ…pe…
tika-abh05t1:80_4: Visabhāgatānibandhassa vibhāgassa abhāvena avibhāgehi tehi tīhi khandhehi.
tika-abh05t1:80_6: Vibhāgarahitehīti samānakālasantānehi ekacittuppādagatattā avibhattehi vedanākkhandhādīhi na yuttaṁ vippayuttanti vattuṁ.
tika-abh05t1:80_10: Na hi vijjamānaṁ rūpārūpaṁ aññamaññassa visabhāgaṁ na hoti.
tika-abh05t1:80_13: evaṁ yaṁ āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṁ na hotīti attho.
tika-abh05t1:80_16: sampayogārahasseva ca vippayogoti atthibhāvasannissayā sampayuttavippayuttatāti āha ‘‘paccuppannabhāvaṁ nissāyā’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:81_3: sampayogo natthīti etena pārisesato vijjamānassa ca vijjamānena sampayogo dassito.
tika-abh05t1:81_4: Avijjamānatādīpake bhede gahiteti yathāgahitesu dhammesu tehi vippayogīnaṁ avijjamānabhāvadīpake tesaṁyeva
tika-abh05t1:81_5: visese ‘‘arūpabhavo ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto’’tiādinā (dhātu.
tika-abh05t1:81_6: 246) gahite teneva ruppanādinā bhedena tesaṁ aññamaññaṁ visabhāgatāpi gahitā evāti vippayogo hotīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t1:81_7: Bhede pana aggahite tena tena gahaṇenāti yathāvutte avijjamānatādīpake visese,
tika-abh05t1:81_9: saṅkhārakkhandho tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayutto’’tiādinā tena tena gahaṇena
tika-abh05t1:81_11: Tathā ca sati sabhāgatte kā panettha sabhāgatāti āha ‘‘vijjamānatāya…pe… hotī’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:82_1: So hi vitakkarahitattā avitakko vicāramatto ca.
tika-abh05t1:82_5: Tenevāti savitakkasavicāresu cittuppādesu vitakkassa avitakkavicāramattaggahaṇena idha aggahitattā,
tika-abh05t1:82_13: Yadi hi te savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikā siyuṁ,
tika-abh05t1:82_20: Yathā hi ye samudayasaccena sampayuttehi vippayuttā,
tika-abh05t1:82_21: tesaṁ kehici vippayogaṁ vattuṁ na sakkā,
tika-abh05t1:82_25: vuttoti ettha dasamanaye tehi avitakkavicāramattehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṁ soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayogo vutto,
tika-abh05t1:82_26: osānanaye tehi vippayuttānaṁ aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgaho ca vuttoti tasmā na te savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikāti dasseti.
tika-abh05t1:83_3: Sabbepi teti dutiyajjhānadhammā vitakko cāti sabbepi te dhammā sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-abh05t1:83_4: Tathā hi sampayogavippayogapadaniddese ‘‘avitakkavicāramattā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā’’ti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:83_8: so ca vicārato aññenapi sampayuttoti codanaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘na hi tadekadesassa…pe… hotī’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:83_11: yathā iddhipādasamudāyassa ekadesabhūtānaṁ chandiddhipādādīnaṁ tīhi khandhehi sampayogo vutto,
tika-abh05t1:83_13: evaṁ idhāpi vitakkassa aññehi sampayogo avitakkavicāramattassa samudāyassa na hotīti.
tika-abh05t1:84_0: Yadi evaṁ ‘‘iddhipādo dvīhi khandhehi sampayutto’’tiādi na vattabbanti ce?
tika-abh05t1:84_4: Tehi vedanākkhandhādīhi sampayuttatā vuttā ‘‘iddhipādo dvīhi khandhehi sampayutto’’tiādinā.
tika-abh05t1:84_6: Na hītiādinā yathādhigatadhammānaṁ sampayuttatāya navattabbābhāvaṁ udāharaṇadassanavasena vibhāveti.
tika-abh05t1:84_7: Keci vicikicchā taṁsahagatā ca mohavajjā mohena sampayuttā,
tika-abh05t1:84_10: Iti iminā kāraṇena na samudāyo tena mohena sampayutto.
tika-abh05t1:84_11: Añño koci dhammo hetubhāvo nāpi atthi,
tika-abh05t1:84_12: yena hetunā so dassanenapahātabbahetukoti vutto samudāyo.
tika-abh05t1:84_15: Evanti yathā dassanenapahātabbahetukasamudāyassa sampayuttatā na vattabbā,
tika-abh05t1:84_18: Tasmāti yasmā avitakkavicāramattesu kocipi vicārena asampayutto natthi, tasmā.
tika-abh05t1:87_1: sampayuttehi ca vippayutte rūpanibbānādike tadaññadhamme satipi vippayogābhāvato.
tika-abh05t1:87_2: Saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṁ vitthārena dassetuṁ ‘‘na hī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:87_3: Tato lobhasahagatacittuppādato aññadhammānaṁ avasiṭṭhānaṁ kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṁ khandhādīsu kenaci
tika-abh05t1:87_4: vippayogo na hi atthi khandhapañcakādīnaṁ saṅgaṇhanato tesaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:87_5: Te eva cittuppādāti te lobhasahagatacittuppādā eva.
tika-abh05t1:87_7: Tathāti iminā na ca te eva dhammā aḍḍhadutiyāyatanadhātuyo,
tika-abh05t1:87_8: atha kho te ca tato aññe cāti imamatthaṁ upasaṁharati.
tika-abh05t1:88_0: Nanu tadaññabhāvato eva tehi itaresaṁ vippayogo siddhoti āha ‘‘na cā’’tiādi.
tika-abh05t1:88_1: Tadaññasamudāyehīti tato lobhasahagatacittuppādato aññasamudāyehi aññe lobhasahagatā dhammā vippayuttā na honti. Kasmā?
tika-abh05t1:88_6: tathā ye ekadesā hutvā aññesaṁ avayavānaṁ samudāyabhūtā,
tika-abh05t1:88_8: Anena samudāyena avayavassa samudāyassa avayavena ca tassa na vippayogo,
tika-abh05t1:88_10: Esa nayoti yvāyaṁ samudayasacce vutto vidhi,
tika-abh05t1:88_14: ‘‘So hi samudāyo’’tiādiko vuttanayo labbhatīti āha ‘‘aggahaṇe kāraṇaṁ na dissatī’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:89_2: yato samudayasaccādi idha na gahitanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh05t1:89_3: Sampayuttādhikārato ‘‘aññenā’’ti padaṁ sampayuttato aññaṁ vadatīti āha ‘‘asampayuttena asammissanti attho’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:89_7: Cittanti ‘‘cittehi dhammehi ye dhammā’’ti pañhaṁ upalakkheti.
tika-abh05t1:89_8: Sahayuttapadehi sattāti ‘‘cetasikehi dhammehi ye dhammā’’tiādinā cittena sahayutte dhamme dīpentehi padehi āgatā satta pañhā.
tika-abh05t1:90_1: Uddhaṭapadena pakāsiyamānā atthā abhedopacārena ‘‘uddhaṭapada’’nti vuttāti āha ‘‘uddhaṭapadena sampayuttehī’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:90_3: Manena yuttāti ettha mananamattattā manodhātu ‘‘mano’’ti vuttāti āha ‘‘manodhātuyā ekantasampayuttā’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:93_1: Rūpakkhandhena vippayuttā nāma cattāro arūpino khandhā,
tika-abh05t1:93_2: tesaṁ aññehi sampayogo nāma natthi tādisassa aññassa sampayogino abhāvato.
tika-abh05t1:93_3: Samudāyassa ca ekadesena sampayogo natthīti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh05t1:96_1: ‘‘Samāsapadaṁ ida’’nti vatvā ayaṁ nāma samāsoti dassento ‘‘yassa khandhādino’’tiādimāha,
tika-abh05t1:96_3: Yaṁ idha sampayuttaṁ vuttanti imasmiṁ navamanaye yaṁ dhammajātaṁ sampayuttanti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:96_5: Tañhi dhammajātaṁ attanā sampayuttena vedanākkhandhādinā sayaṁ sampayuttanti niddhāritaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:96_9: tehi rūpakkhandho vippayutto’’ti vatvā nibbānaṁ kathanti codanaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘nibbānaṁ pana sukhumarūpagatikamevā’’ti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:96_10: ‘‘Manāyatanaṁ ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayutta’’nti ettha hi yathā sukhumarūpaṁ viya sarūpato
tika-abh05t1:96_11: anuddhaṭampi nibbānaṁ kehicītipadena gahitameva hotīti edisesu ṭhānesu nibbānaṁ sukhumarūpagatikanti
tika-abh05t1:96_13: evamidhāpi ‘‘rūpamissakehi vā’’ti etena anupādinnaanupādāniyādīhi nibbānamissakehipi asampayogo vutto hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh05t1:96_14: Avikalacatukkhandhasaṅgāhakehi padehi sahavattino aññassa sampayogino abhāvato atītānāgatehi ca sampayogo
tika-abh05t1:96_18: ke pana te rūpena asammissā arūpekadesabhūtā.
tika-abh05t1:99_2: tesu keci vippayuttassa dhammantarassa abhāvato keci khandhādīhi vippayogasseva asambhavatoti imamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘dhammāyatanādidhammā’’tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t1:99_3: Tattha sabbacittuppādagatadhammabhāvatoti iminā bhinnakālatādivisesavato arūpakkhandhassa vippayuttassa dhammantarassa abhāvamāha,
tika-abh05t1:99_5: Kāmabhavo upapattibhavo saññībhavo pañcavokārabhavoti ime cattāro mahābhavā.
tika-abh05t1:99_8: tehi vippayuttānaṁ tesaṁyeva dukkhasaccādīnaṁ khandhādīsu kenaci vippayogo sambhavati.
tika-abh05t1:102_2: ‘‘Etena saha sambandho’’ti iminā padānaṁ sambandhadassanamukhena ‘‘samudayasaccena ye dhammā sampayuttā’’ti
tika-abh05t1:102_3: pāḷiyā atthavivaraṇaṁ pākaṭataraṁ katvā kehicītipadassatthaṁ kātuṁ ‘‘kehicīti etassa panā’’tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t1:102_5: Visesetvāti ettha tesaṁ dhammānaṁ taṇhāvajjānaṁ saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātupariyāpannatākittanaṁ visesanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:102_6: yato te samudayasaccena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitāti vuttā.
tika-abh05t1:102_7: Sayaṁ attanā sampayutto na hotīti vuttaṁ ‘‘attavajjehī’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:102_8: Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘cittaṁ na vattabbaṁ cittena sampayuttantipi,
tika-abh05t1:102_10: Sampayogārahehīti visesanaṁ sukhumarūpaṁ nibbānanti dve sandhāya kataṁ,
tika-abh05t1:105_2: dvādasamanaye ca sampayogavisiṭṭhā saṅgahitāsaṅgahitāti ubhayatthāpi sampayogavisiṭṭhāva gahitāti āha ‘‘dvādasama…pe…
tika-abh05t1:108_6: Satipi asaṅgāhakatte tehi asaṅgahitānaṁ sampayogo na sambhavatīti vedanākkhandhādayo idha terasamanaye vissajjanaṁ na ruhanti nārohanti.
tika-abh05t1:108_7: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena rūpārūpadhammā asaṅgahitā honti,
tika-abh05t1:109_3: Na tesaṁ vippayogo natthi tabbinimuttassa cittuppādassa sambhavato.
tika-abh05t1:109_4: Vedanākkhandhena asaṅgahitānaṁ anārammaṇamissakattā na ‘‘vippayogassa atthitāyā’’ti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:113_4: sā tathābhūtāpi vissajjetabbadhammābhāvassa ñāpikā hotīti āha ‘‘tesaṁ pucchāya moghattā te na labbhantī’’ti.
tika-abh05t1:113_7: Tena ca sahāti tena aṭṭhamanayena saddhiṁ imasmiṁ osānanaye aṭṭhamanaye ca osānanaye ca ete dhammāyatanādayo sabbappakārena na labbhanti.
